function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Surveillance may infringe on privacy rights of individuals.","Impact":"Violation of privacy and civil liberties, leading to public backlash and legal challenges.","Mitigation":"Implement strict data protection and privacy laws, anonymize data, and obtain consent from individuals.","Technologies":"Anonymization tools, consent management platforms, encryption technologies.","People":"General public, civil liberty organizations.","Owner":"Government, data protection authorities."},{"Description":"Surveillance technology may be used for purposes other than controlling the pandemic.","Impact":"Misuse of surveillance data for unauthorized surveillance or tracking of individuals for non-health-related purposes.","Mitigation":"Regulate the use of surveillance data, conduct regular audits, and impose strict penalties for unauthorized use.","Technologies":"Auditing tools, compliance monitoring platforms, governance frameworks.","People":"General public, civil liberty organizations, regulatory authorities.","Owner":"Government, regulatory authorities."},{"Description":"Dependence on surveillance technology may create a false sense of security.","Impact":"Decreased adherence to other preventive measures and over-reliance on technology for pandemic control.","Mitigation":"Public education on the limitations of surveillance technology, promotion of other preventive measures, and monitoring public behavior.","Technologies":"Public education campaigns, behavior monitoring tools, multi-faceted communication platforms.","People":"General public, health organizations, policymakers.","Owner":"Government, health organizations, communication agencies."}]}
